title: Premier League Table Prediction Analysis
description: Predicted next season's Premier League final table utilizing statistical modeling techniques from scikit-learn. Scraped Premier League data from internet.

title: Recipes and Ratings Analysis
description: Utilizing a large dataset of recipe and rating data, I worked on a project on determining if a recipe is high-calorie or low-calorie

title: Weather Forecasting of Argentina
description: Created multiple models to forecast weather in Argentina, learning the techniques and skills to apply data science to meterology professionally

title: Data Visualization of Weather Across U.S. Metropolitan Cities
description: Preprocessed data from a dataset containing weather across various U.S. cities, and created an geospatial map visualizing the change of weather across seasons in each city.

title: Uber Data Analysis
description: Analyzed Uber ride data, analyzing which trips were most likely to be used for business trips, which trips have longer durations, etc..

title: Credit Card Fraud Analysis
description: Used decision trees, pipelines, and more tools and techniques to predict credit card fraud done with good accuracy.

title: Spotify Music Picker
description: Based on your listening history and a survey, my application generates songs that you would most likely prefer to listen to.

title: Airbnb Data Visualization
description: Created an SQL database, populated it using large data of Airbnb prices and locations in Seattle, ran queries, then created visualizations in Tableau

title: Movie Sentiment Analysis
description: A simple prediction algorithm, running sentiment analysis on movie reviews to predict overall rating.

title: Text mining the Gutenberg library of books
description: Utilizing data from the open-source Gutenberg Library, I trained a autocorrect algorithm based on the n-gram model.

title: Data Visualization of Flights Across the U.S.
description: Made a data visualization in plotly of flights across the United States, helping viewers find trends in flight routes and destinations

title: Image Filter and Upscaler
description: With Python, I worked on a project that decodes pixels and upscales images, puts images through filters, and remaps grayscale images into colored images.
